content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's indeed talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Initially thinking about finding a reasonable offer close to the market value, but with your kindness shown so far as the landlord, I'm inclined to suggest considering a slight discount, Mr. Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's an interesting proposal, Emilia. I'm always open to reasonable offers. Let's hear your proposal for the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my circumstances as a responsible student and your generous stance, I would like to propose a rental price slightly lower than the market value, perhaps 920 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your proposal, Emilia. However, I'm looking to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate a higher rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, but as I mentioned before, my financial situation allows me to focus on a lower end of the price range. I'm afraid raising the offer above 920 Euros would be challenging for me. If you cannot meet this price, I understand and will continue my search elsewhere.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Emilia. However, I need to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I'm sorry, but I can't accept your offer of 920 Euros per month. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the rental price you proposed is too low for my liking.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your candor, Mr. Schmidt. I respect your position. In this case, I will keep searching for alternative housing options. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
